p: The results of phylogenetic analysis showed that Pestivirus A−1o, Pestivirus A−1b, and Pestivirus A−1m were the predominant genotypes in our samples, followed by Pestivirus A−1q and Pestivirus A−1u. Furthermore, among these three predominant genotypes, Pestivirus A−1b and Pestivirus A−1m are frequently reported in China ( 27– 30, 49, 50) the Pestivirus A 1a found in Henan province ( 51) was not detected in this work.
